financialSupport.title: Lusito Lwemali
financialSupport.description: Tfola tiphakamiso tetfutselo telungiselelwe wena futsi uye emahlalweni emali lacinisako.

gbvSupport.title: Lusito lwe-GBV
gbvSupport.description: Tfola lusito lolusheshayo netindawo tekuphepha letiphepha lapho utidzinga kakhulu.

sanitaryAid.title: Lusito Lwekuhlambuluka
sanitaryAid.description: Tfola emabhokisi ekupha lasedvute futsi ufinyelele kutfutfukisa kwekuhlambuluka lokubalulekile.

aiAssistant.title: Lumsiti lwe-AI
aiAssistant.description: Tfola tiphendvulo letisheshayo neluhlahlo kusukela esitfutfukisweni setfu selusito loluhlakaniphile.

submitRequests.title: Thumela Ticelo
submitRequests.description: Thumela futsi ulandzele ticelo takho telusito ngesitfutfukiso setfu lesilula kusisebentisa.

aboutUs.title: Ngati
aboutUs.description: Fundza kabanzi ngenhloso yetfu yekucinisa bomake kuyo yonkhe iNingizimu Afrika.

cta.title: Usukulungele Kucala?
cta.description: Joyina tinkulungwane tebomake labatfole lusito nekuciniswa ngelipulatifomu letfu.
